official_title: A bill to prohibit conduct injurious to transportation markets, and for related purposes.
short_title: Act to Protect Commercial Transportation Markets

summary.text: Act to Protect Commercial Transportation Markets - Prohibits a carrier from engaging in any commercial activity which undermines or tends to destroy competition, or is discriminatory. Sets forth civil penalties for violation of this Act.

titles.title: Act to Protect Commercial Transportation Markets
A bill to prohibit conduct injurious to transportation markets, and for related purposes.
